  • Constructor Details

    • Pterodactyl

      public Pterodactyl​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Boolean isBaby)
      Constructor. All Pterodactyl are represented by an 'p' and have up to 100 hit points.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this Stegosaur
      isBaby - boolean that's true if Allosaur to create is a baby.

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      Determines which action to take this turn. Overrides super to decrement Stegosaurs it cannot attack
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      Action to execute this turn.
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)
